title: Farage criticised for £400,000 job promoting physical gold as pension investment
description: Exclusive: Reform leader promotes Direct Bullion – but experts say commodity is not for everyday investors
content:
Nigel Farage has been criticised over his £400,000-a-year second job promoting the idea that people should buy physical gold and put it into their pension pots.

title: Jethro Tull founding member Mick Abrahams dies aged 82
description: Lead singer Ian Anderson says Mick Abrahams was "vitally important" to the band's early line-up.
content:
Mick Abrahams, a founding member of rock band Jethro Tull, has died at the age of 82.
Posting on the band's official website, external, lead singer Ian Anderson said he was sorry to hear of the death of the "strong vocalist and experienced, powerful ... [351 chars]

title: Faversham woman dies after crash on M2 between Sittingbourne and Hempstead
description: Police have confirmed a young woman has been killed in a serious collision which closed part of a motorway.
content:
A young woman has died after a fatal crash on the M2.
It happened on the M2 westbound at around 1pm, between Junction 5, at the Stockbury Interchange near Sittingbourne, and Junction 4 at the Brooms Wood Interchange near Hempstead.

content:
